verses.kjv: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.
verses.ct: Listen to my cry, God; pay attention to my prayer.

verses.kjv: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
verses.ct: From the farthest corners of the earth I call out to you when my heart is falling apart — guide me to the rock that stands above me.

verses.kjv: For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.
verses.ct: Because you have been my refuge, a fortress of protection against my enemies.

verses.kjv: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.
verses.ct: Let me live in your dwelling place forever; let me find safety in the shelter of your wings. Selah.

verses.kjv: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.
verses.ct: Because you, God, have heard my promises; you have given me the inheritance that belongs to those who are wholeheartedly dedicated to your name.

verses.kjv: Thou wilt prolong the king’s life: and his years as many generations.
verses.ct: Add more days to the king's life; extend his years through many generations.

verses.kjv: He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth, which may preserve him.
verses.ct: May he remain in God's presence forever; appoint mercy and truth to watch over him.

verses.kjv: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.
verses.ct: Then I will sing praise to your name forever, fulfilling my promises day after day.
